Message.Description: Is there an extra zero or you asked for twenty-five thousands?!
I am still waiting. He originally said the CD company takes 4-6 weeks for turnaround. The album release is in about 2 weeks, and I still have not heard back.
That is fine, take your time no rush. I like your work and we will like you to take your time.
Melanie i hope you found the best place for you!
Turns out they wanted to implement things like fully responsive dynamic content, useful apps, etc â€“ all things I told them they needed in the first place but which they opted not to include.
please add me to your LinkedIn network
